de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.petrinet.abstr

类 AbstractTransition<E extends AbstractFlowRelation<? extends AbstractPlace<E,S>,? extends AbstractTransition<E,S>,S>,S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.petrinet.abstr.AbstractPNNode<E>
      • de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.petrinet.abstr.AbstractTransition<E,S>
  • 类型参数:
    E - The type of flow relations connected to the transition.
    S -
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    AbstractCPNTransition, AbstractPTTransition

    public abstract class AbstractTransition<E extends AbstractFlowRelation<? extends AbstractPlace<E,S>,? extends AbstractTransition<E,S>,S>,S>
extends AbstractPNNode<E>
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class that defines general properties for Petri net transitions.
    This class inherits basic Petri net node properties from AbstractPNNode
    and defines additional properties:
    • Enabled state: Based on the state of connectet places,
      transitions can be enabled. Enabled transitions can fire,
      which means that they remove tokens from incoming places and put tokens in outgoing places.
    • Silent state: In some cases, Petri nets are modeled with additional
      non-functional transitions to reach a more compact net shape.
      To distinguish such transitions from regular net transitions, they can be set silent.

    A transition allows TransitionListeners to register so that they can be notified on state changes,
    i.e. enabling/disabling/firing.
    作者:
    Thomas Stocker
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • checkValidity

        public void checkValidity()
                   throws PNValidationException
        Checks if the Petri net transition is valid.
        Subclasses may define the validity of a net transition e.g. in terms of specific constraints and must throw PNValidationExceptions in case any constraint is violated.
        抛出:
        PNValidationException

      • checkState

        public void checkState()
        Checks the enabled-state of the transition based on the state of connected places.
        It checks if the input places contain the required tokens and the output places have enough capacity to consume produced tokens.
        Depending on the state representation of places this may require different check routines,
        which have to be implemented by subclasses.

        If the transition gets enabled or disabled, the transition notifies all transition listeners.
        另请参阅:
        enoughTokensInInputPlaces(), enoughSpaceInOutputPlaces()

      • fire

        public void fire()
          throws PNException
        Fires the transition.
        On firing, the transition removes tokens from incoming places and puts tokens in outgoing places.
        Depending on the state representation of places this may require different check routines,
        which have to be implemented by subclasses.
        抛出:
        PNException - If transition is not enabled or not in a valid state.

      • addTransitionListener

        public void addTransitionListener(TransitionListener<AbstractTransition<E,S>> listener)
        Adds a transition listener.
        参数:
        listener - The transition listener to add.
        抛出:
        de.invation.code.toval.validate.ParameterException - If the listener reference is null.
